chapter.text: Ate jadom samudara (ikathe ho ke) vaga painage
Ate jadom kabaram khol'ha diti'am janagi'am
Hareka bada jana lavega ki usane age ki bheji'a ate piche ki chadi'a
He manukha! Tuhanu kihari ciza ne apane raba valom dhokhe vica pa rakhi'a hai
Jisa ne tuhanu paida kita, phira tere agam nu thika kita, phira tuhanu satulata vica rakhi'a
Phira jisa rupa vica cahi'a tuhanu akara de dita
Kade vi nahim; sagom tusim inasafa de dina tom inakara karade ho
Halanki asi' tuhade te nigarana niyukata karana vale ham
Uce rutabe ate (tuhadi'am galam) likhana vale
Uha janade hana jo tusim karade ho
Besaka neka loka arama vica honage
Inasafa de dina uha usa vica sute janage
Uha usa tom alaga hona vale nahim
Ate tuhanu ki pata ki inasafa da dina ki hai
â€œPhera,ate tuhanu ki pata ki inasafa da dina ki hai
Usa dina ko'i prani kise duje prani la'i kujha nahim kara sakega. Ate mamala usa dina alaha de hi adhikara vica hovega
